Backend

Create classes from master table

Take a master table as entry and create dynamically classes based on the table attributes using pydantic package.

MEDprofiles.src.back.create_classes_from_master_table.add_attributes_to_class(path, class_name, attribute_list, types_list, base_class, import_attributes=True)

Add attributes from attribute_list to class file with class defined as class_name(base_class).

Parameters:

  • path – Directory of the class file.

  • class_name – Name of the considered class.

  • attribute_list – Attributes to add.

  • types_list – Types of the attributes to add.

  • base_class – Class from which the class we create inherit.

Returns:

MEDprofiles.src.back.create_classes_from_master_table.create_class_file(path, class_name, attribute_list, base_class, directory_name)

Define a class in a new file in a specific path.

Param:

path: Path where place the class definition.

Param:

class_name: Name of the class we define.

Param:

attribute_list: Attribute list of the class we define, elements of the list may be tuples (attribute, type, boolean) if boolean is true, the attribute is optional.

Returns:

MEDprofiles.src.back.create_classes_from_master_table.get_classes_from_df(df)

Create a classes dict from a pandas dataframe. DataFrame columns names must be like ClassName_ClassAttribute and must contain a row for column types.

Parameters:

df – The pandas dataframe.

Returns:

classes_dict: Dict where keys are classes and values are lists of tuples(class_attribute, class_attribute_type, True).

MEDprofiles.src.back.create_classes_from_master_table.main(path_master_table, path_MEDclasses='../../MEDclasses')

Main function for class creation.

Parameters:

  • path_master_table – Path to the master table from which we create the classes.

  • path_MEDclasses – Path to the folder where we create the MEDclasses.

Returns:

Instantiate classes from master table

Take a master table as entry and instantiate the data. The file ‘create_classes_from_master_table’ must have been executed before run.

MEDprofiles.src.back.instantiate_data_from_master_table.main(source_file, destination_file)

Instantiate a list of MEDPatient objects from a csv file in MEDPatientData file with pickle.

Parameters:

  • source_file – path to master table file

  • destination_file – path to the generated pickle file
